features: 【2K Crystal-Clear Live View and Full-color Night Vision】The outdoor cameras for home security provide 2K high-resolution image and wide viewing angle, make you see any details. Feature with white lights and advanced infrared sensor, the outside security cameras with night vision enables sharp full color and infrared vision up to 50ft. You can view stunning night vision even in the dim light environment. It could be chosen to auto switch the infrared to color night vision when person is detected.

【100% Wireless Security Cam and Continuous Solar Powered Cameras】The Solar security cameras are totally wire-free. Built-in enhanced antennas, stably connect with 2.4GHz WiFi. Fully charge battery for 8h to achieve up to 6 months of standby. A 9.51ft long cable solar panel harvests sunlight for trickle charging, greatly avoiding frequent removal and recharge. IP65 weatherproof design makes it easy to place this wireless indoor and outdoor security camera anywhere. (Not support 5GHz Wi-Fi)

【Advanced Motion Detection and Real-time Alerts】The security camera wireless outdoor built-in newest artificial smart PIR sensor. Human detection only by default. Optional to turn on AI Analysis that identify persons, pets, vehicles and packages. It will trigger, record and push instant notification to you once motions are detected. See what happened and react quicker via app. The manual or auto spotlight and siren alarms of the wireless security camera help get rid of unwanted visitors.

【Two-Way Audio and Multi-Users Sharing】Built in two-way microphone and speaker, you could easily communicate with others in real-time anywhere through this wireless security camera outdoor. Video clarity and noise-canceled audio are perfect enough to be used for the baby, and elder. With just one QR code, you can unlimited share your camera access with family or friends for greater monitoring and protection.

【Lifetime Free 7-day Rolling Cloud Storage and Free SD Card Storage】This home security camera comes with lifetime free 7-day rolling cloud storage. All recordings could be stored automatically in the cloud and remain for 7 days. It also supports up to 128GB Micro-SD card local storage to back up and store videos in the SD card once the network is disconnected. Data transmission between the camera and the cloud is encrypted from end to end. Nobody except you can access it. (SD card not included)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Peace of mind, rain or shine, day or night The wireless camera for home security records movements day and night, keeps you updated on what's happening.Continuable solar-powered and powerful battery for all year guard.Default humanoid detection to avoid more false triggers.Supports upgrading to advanced AI recognizes people, vehicles, pets(cats and dogs) and packages.All recordings could be auto-stored in the cloud for free and be overwritten after 7 days. *Not support 5GHz Wi-Fi

Versatile installation methods suitable for multiple scenes The lighter and more flexible design makes the security camera suitable for indoor and outdoor surveillance. (Not support 5GHz Wi-Fi)Easily place your wireless security camera flat on the table, hang it on the roof, or screw it onto a wall.

Sharp and clear 2K live view, 3 modes of night vision Full-color night vision, see every detail even at night.Freedom to choose the night vision mode that suits you.Auto-switch infrared night vision to color night vision when motion is detected.Light up the motions, make you react quickly with spotlight/siren alarms and 2-way audio.

Customize the camera settings as your need Customize Sensitivity-- Up to 10 levels for you to adjust the detection distance in which to catch every movement properly.Customize Alarm Area-- Set up Alert areas to only get notified about what you matter and reduce unwanted notifications outside alert areas.Customize Alert Plan--Schedule the working time of the camera, easily avoid climbing up and down to turn it on or off when you are unneeded.Customize Alarm Kinds-- Free to set the flashlight and siren alarm on according to your need and environment to keep danger away.
One click to know what is happening With one tap, you could easily enter the live view and see what is happening now.50% faster loading speed to catch the movement instantly.

Schedule Alert Time The outside cameras security wireless support scheduling the working time and turning on/off the camera through the app. Automatically turns off at unnecessary times to protect your privacy. Greatly saving battery life and reducing unnecessary notifications. Low Battery Warnings The home security camera alerts you as the battery power gets lower than 20%. Pop-up messages appear on your lock screen or phone. No more constant attention and worrying about battery power. Multi-users Access Camera These cameras for home security allow sharing with unlimited people, protecting your home together from different cities and countries. View the live feed through different phones at the same time by just scanning one QR Code.

Set up and use with ease 2.4GHz wire-free design with stable Wi-Fi connection makes you place, stand, or mount it in the garage, doorway, flat, living room or anywhere.It’s a snap to set and control the camera with the user-friendly app.Not support 24/7 recording. It is a fantastic all-around device. Boasting solar and battery power, 2K resolution, a wide field of view, two-way talk, a loud built-in siren, a reliable spotlight, full-color night vision, and a load of other smarts. An excellent outdoor security camera can be a reliable and powerful guard that keeps you in peace of mind and accompanies you all year.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality and Value
reviews.reviewText: I bought this camera to monitor the chain-link fence in my back yard as "someone" keeps vandalizing it. My yard is pretty small, but still within range of the camera's detection (30 - 50ft). I tried setting it up from inside the porch but the screen does impede it's detection ability (which I figured would happen). I mounted the camera outside my back porch and made sure to have it pointed and configured to pick up the motion at a distance over to the fence more so than closer to the house.I was confused a bit by the detection settings. Due to the distance, it was not working well with Human Detection enabled when I walked up and down the fence line and I only got one alert. It was not working incredibly well, so I tried all sorts of things- I ended up discovering if I turn OFF "Human Detection", it has a better chance of actually detecting humans at a distance (since they look smaller). After removing Human Detection, it was picking up a small palm tree in the back neighbor's yard whipping around when there were some heavy gusts that came through. I was happy with that level of detection. Not much goes on back there, so any alarm will be rare.The camera charged up nicely out of the box, and has been sitting at 100% for two days now. Since alarms will be rare in my scenario, I upped the recording time to 20 seconds. It is warned that the longer it's on and the longer it records, the more battery it uses up (which is a given anyway).You get 6 seconds of playback from anything stored in the cloud unless you want to pay $3.99 per month for full cloud access- so that is NOT free. You also have to pay for AI detection which is 2.99 per month or $1.99 per month for rolling months (auto renew). The app however, is free and looks and works great. I also installed a 128GB microSD card and it records to it flawlessly! I used my PC to wipe the microSD and format it to FAT. The camera then formatted the card for its use. I did a couple of test alerts, pulled the card, plugged it into my PC, and was able to view all of the videos in their entirety. Follow the directions that come with the camera that state to install the microSD card before you turn it on so that the camera is able to detect it. Formatting is done from the app after the camera is set up and the card is successfully detected.All in all, if the detection continues to function properly (my only worry at this point), this was well worth the price. I recommend you give it a try if you need occurrence security monitoring (not 24/7 security monitoring).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great camera for the price
reviews.reviewText: The camera is pretty clear and has a lot of features for the price. Motion detection works great, night mode is pretty clear, and overall video quality is good. Setup is pretty easy and the app is easy to use as long as the wifi connection is strong where you have the camera set up. Catches movement and its easy to go scroll through the events and set up notifications as needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great security camera
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for indoor use. Great product for the price. Easy to set-up and connect. The size is perfect to be utilized anywhere. Notifications will keep you updated and aware. Clear picture and sound!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Packaged nicely, set is a breeze! The best part is there is no wires or anything jus fully charge it after opening download the app connect to your wifi and that's it. I also have the doorbell camera from this company and I love that so much I wanted to get another for backyard when the kids are out playing. With that all I had to do was add a device on the app and now they are both connected on the same app super easy to switch back and forth from. The picture is very clear, night vision is great and sound is loud and clear. Battery seems to be long lasting after 2 days of having it up it is still at full battery. Definitelyy my favorite security system.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars New Tech - Far Better Than the Old One I Had - Works Well with My Old Phone Too
reviews.reviewText: I replaced a security camera I've had for 3 years with this one.I was very surprised how the tech in this camera is so far advanced over my 'old' one.Much easier to download the app onto my phone.I'm using an old Samsung Galaxy S9 - don't judge me... : )Wifi connection was a breeze.The CloudEdge app is well laid out and understandable.I can access an Installation Guide from within the app. (Not really needed though.)Clear image - I have mine set to the QHD setting (2560 x 1440). Very sharp.The other option is SD resolution - a decent image but QHD spoils a person.I put a 32 gig micro SD card in it - this can accept an up to 128 gig card.Card formatting is done through the Recording Management section of the app.It has motion detection, 2 way audio, different lighting options, siren and audio warning with strobe light.Also other stuff that can be controlled via the app. Nice to be able to turn alerts on or off depending on day/time/my mood.This has an internal battery which is still close to 100% after 4 days. Convenient to be completely wireless. I don't have it recording 24 hours a day though. Only when motion is detected and while I've been playing with the camera settings.It has a power port too so, if I want, I can keep it powered via the included USB cable and a (not included) standard wall USB adapter.I like the tripod female screw adapter on the bottom of the camera. I just grabbed one of my old tripods and screwed it in. It is flat on the bottom so I can also just set it on a table with no tripod. I also like that a mounting adapter and screws are included in case I want to mount it to a wall. The mounting adapter has a tripod screw so it's easy to take the camera off the wall mount and use it elsewhere temporarily if I want.Size is not huge - fits in my palm.Has some weight to it too, very well built.I also like the lifetime guarantee this company provides.I hope my review helps others decide if this is for them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The price was awesome and so was the Sd card. The product works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Arrived very quickly
reviews.reviewText: The picture from the camera is sharp, and there were good instructions for setting it up. It seems to have a lot of options for controlling it, and the motion detection seems to work very well. The app is pretty confusing and I'm having a problem where I can't get the command to manually record to work. I'll keep trying and if I can get it to function then it would be five stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to set up!
